claim: Minions was written by Brian Lynch and directed by Pierre Coffin and Kyle Balda.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Produced by Illumination Entertainment for Universal Pictures , it was directed by Pierre Coffin and Kyle Balda , written by Brian Lynch , and produced by Chris Meledandri and Janet Healy .
